nodes.text: Eczar was an astronomical object located within the Eczar system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Seswenna sector. The Filar-Nitzan infiltrator Vacander maintained a bank account on Eczar by 2 ABY.

Eczar was first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Eczar system, and therefore the celestial body Eczar, in grid square M-18.
